des: "You can use sugar or equal.  Keeps in refrigerator and heat as you want.  This is sweet and tangy."
ins: Place the instant tea, allspice, cinnamon and nutmeg in a bag and steep in the boiling water for 5 minutes. Stir in the cherry gelatin and let mixture cool. Add the orange juice, lemon juice, cranberry juice and sugar. Mix until sugar is dissolved.  Serve warm, keep any extra in the refrigerator.
